thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Kindred Healthcare Q4 Core EPS $0.20 From Continuing Operations

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kindred Healthcare Q4 Core EPS $0.20 From Continuing Operations
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Kindred Healthcare Inc:
* KINDRED HEALTHCARE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 CORE EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.20 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* REAFFIRMS 2018 OUTLOOK * QTRLY REVENUES $1.48 BILLION VERSUS $1.52 BILLION * RECORDED A $236.3 MILLION NON-CASH GOODWILL IMPAIRMENT CHARGE IN Q4
* QTRLY GAAP DILUTED LOSS PER SHARE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS WAS $1.65
* SEES 2018 ANNUAL REVENUES OF $6.0 BILLION, WITH A RANGE OF $5.9 BILLION TO $6.1 BILLION
* FOR 2018,SEES CORE DILUTED EPS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS OF $0.75, WITH A RANGE OF $0.65 TO $0.85
* FOR 2018, SEES CORE EBITDA OF $515 MILLION, WITH A RANGE OF $500 MILLION TO $530 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
